title: Start
body:
Oracle appears 
Oracle:Chosen one, the order has been compromised.
Oracle:[[The storm of 1674 has weakened the fabric of time and space, causing a time rift here.|]]
Player: [[ answer: Why? |RestoringTheSquare]] [[ answer: ...|RestoringTheSquare]]

title: RestoringTheSquare
body:
Oracle:Now that they are restoring the Dom Tower the rift has been opened.
Oracle:Several historical figures  have been transported to the present, as well the basilisk of Utrecht.
Oracle:The terrible beast has left them petrified throughout the city.
Oracle:You must free them and send them back to their time line and defeat the Basilisk to impeach the collapse of history.
Oracle:If you fail, the rift will grow bigger, sucking in Utrecht and its inhabitants, and eventually the entire world.
Oracle:If you succeed, you shall be rewarded for your bravery.
Oracle:Take this common rue concoction, apply it on the petrified characters and they shall be free from their bronze prison.
Oracle: You will find the Poet Fran√ßois Villon behind Dom Church.Go to him, he will help you find the other historical figures.
Oracle:[[Now be on your way Chosen one, good luck.|]]
Player: [[ answer: Wait, why me? |DoNotQuestionFate]] [[ answer: Ok|Nextlevel]]

title: DoNotQuestionFate
body: Oracle: [[ answer:It is not for us to question fate. Now be on your way. Time is ticking. |Nextlevel]]

title: Nextlevel
body:
Common rue potion appears 
Basilisk character chart appears 
Oracle character chart appears
Route to Villon appears[[Go to Villon|GotoVillon]] |]]

title: GotoVillon
body:
Villon is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Villon: Merci stranger.
Villon: Oh non! La police is there.
[[ Villon runs away| ]] 
Player:[[ answer: Oh no! He stole my wallet- Run after him|Stolenwallet]] [[ answer: He stole my wallet- Hey wait up|Waitup]]

title: GotoCarilloner
body:
Arrive at location 
Carilloner is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Carilloner: Oh Thank you.
Carilloner: Plays the song 
Carilloner: The Builder forgot his hammer. Might you please bring it to him for me? 
Carilloner: He ran to the garden to take care of his flowers as soon as his shift ended
Pick up hammer button  
<<if visited("Carilloner")is true>> [[ Go to the Builder|GotoTheBuilder|]]
Route to next location appears

title: GotoTheBuilder
body:
Arrive at location 
Builder is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Builder: [[Thank you Dakhaas (mate)| ]]
[[ answer: Dakhaas? |Dakhaas]] [[ answer: Who are you calling Dakhaas? Achterlijke gladiool|Dakhaas]] |]]

title: GotoTruus
body:
Arrive at location 
Truus is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Truus: Kammeraod! Thank God the Germans did not catch you. 
Give the Daffodils button.
Truus: Oh! Good! If we want to end the occupation of the Square we need to move quickly. 
Truus: This document will set us free. 
Truus: My contact is waiting in front of the University Building. 
Pick up Declaration button
<<if visited("Truus")is true>> [[ Go to Nassau|GotoNassau|]]
Route to next location appears

title: GotoNassau
body:
Arrive at location 
Nassau is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Nassau: You took your time.  
Nassau: Do you know who I am? 
Nassau: Why didn't you save me before?
Nassau: [[ Don't you know I have other things to do.|]] 
Player: [[ answer: Be thankful that I saved you period. I can also re-petrify you if you are not happy.|YouAchterlijkeGladiool]] [[ answer: Tell me more.|Nottime]]

title: GotoAnnaMaria
body:
Arrive at location 
Anna Maria is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Anna Maria: Thank you discipulus.
Anna Maria: [[ Oh no my books must have fallen when I was attacked by that beast.| ]] 
Player: [[ Help |Helper]]   [[ Don't do anything|Slacker]]

title: GotoBuysBallot
body:
Arrive at location 
Buys Ballot is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Buys Ballot: Did you that storm?!
Buys Ballot: This is excellent research. Yes, excellent! 
Buys Ballot: This was a close one. If it was not for this lightning rod, I would have been electrocuted. 
Buys Ballot cuts the wire and takes out the sword from the ground and give it to you.
Buys Ballot: I have no use for it now, you can return it to its owner. 
Button pick up sword (with wire around the handle). 
<<if visited("BuysBallot")is true>> >> [[ Go to Brinno|GotoBrinno]]
Route to next location appears

title: GotoBrinno
body:
Arrive at location 
Brinno is a statue
Press put concoction on statue button
Brinno: Soldier! The beast slayed so many of our army. 
Brinno: I attacked it with my sword but it was futile.
Brinno: His scales are as hard as diamond.
Brinno: His eyes are made of fire. 
Brinno: His breath is putrid and will make you faint on the spot. 
Brinno: [[ Be brave soldier. A death in battle is a noble death. ]]
[[ answer: Run for your life- End game now |Endgamenow]] |]][[ answer: A death in battle is a noble death- Continue playing|OracleAppears]] |]]

title: Nottime
body:
Nassau: You plebs. 
Nassau: Cannot you see that I am the brother of William of Orange?
Nassau: My time is too valuable to waste on you.
Nassau: I have a declaration to sign. 
Nassau looks in pocket for declaration 
Nassau cannot find the declaration
Nassau: ...
Give the declaration button
Player: Is this what you are looking for? 
Nassau: You dief! How did you stole it! 
Nassau does not give you time to respond. He signs the declaration with a quill and throws it on the ground after using it and leaves.
Pick up quill button.
<<if visited("Nassau")is true>> >> [[ |GotoAnnaMaria|]]
Route to next location appears

title: YouAchterlijkeGladiool
body:
Nassau: You Achterlijke Gladiool. 
Nassau: How dare you talk to me this way?!
Nassau: Do you want to be under the Spanish occupation.
Player: Oh really? 
Player: With what declaration? 
Nassau: ...
Nassau looks in pocket for the declaration
Nassau cannot find the declaration
Nassau: ... 
Nassau: You dief! How did you stole it! I order you to give it back this instant. 
Give the declaration button 
Nassau signs the declaration with a quill and throws it on the ground after using it and leaves.
Pick up quill button.
<<if visited("Nassau")is true>> >> [[ Go to Anna Maria|GotoAnnaMaria|]]
Route to next location appears

title: OracleAppears
body:
Oracle appears
Oracle:Congratulations Chosen One, you have freed all the corrupted figures, saving their lives. 
Oracle: However, your quest is not yet over. 
Oracle: You must now defeat the Basilisk. 
Oracle: Basilisks's weakness are their eyes. 
Oracle: You must find the most reflective surface on the Square.
Oracle: Be on your way Chosen One, time is ticking.
<<if visited("OracleAppears")is true>> >> [[ Go to the Sun|GototheSun]]

title: Endgamenow
body:
Oracle appears
Oracle: You fool! You have doomed us all! 
Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 
Oracle: Can you hear it? 
Oracle: The Basilisk is celebrating its victory. 
The Basilisk dance in victory. 
The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 
The screen goes white. 
Mushroom cloud animation with message. 
Oracle:[[ Congratulations the world has ended because of you | ]]
Player: [[ answer: Oh No! Return to battle |OracleAppears]] |]][[ answer:Ok|end1]] |]]

title: end1
body: End

title: GototheSun
body:
Arrive at location
Pick up the sun button
Basilisk: "angry" screeeeeech 
Basilisk retreats to the shadows of the Dom Tower.The Basilisk is ready to fight.
<<if visited("GototheSun")is true>> >> [[ Go Under the DOm|GoUnderDomTower]]

title: GoUnderDomTower
body:
Arrive at location 
The basilisk hiding in the passage under the Tower.
The basilisk sees you. 
It starts rattling its scales. 
It leans towards you, orienting its deadly gaze towards your face. 
[[ A thunderstorm began to growl in its throat.| ]] 
Player:[[ Look |Death]] [[ Avert your eyes |Continue]]

title: Continue
body:
Use the Sun button
You take the Sun and puts it in front of your face.
The basilisk jumps back with an angry snarl. 
But it is too late. 
His deadly power is transforming him into a statue. 
The statue shatters. 
The Stone transforms into dust and is aspirated by the time rift. 
The rift slowly closes. 
The Basilisk is defeated.
<<if visited ("Continue")is true>> >> [[  Next|GotoEnd2]]

title: Death
body:
Oracle appears
Oracle: You fool! You have doomed us all! 
Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 
Oracle: Can you hear it? 
Oracle: The Basilisk is celebrating its victory. 
The Basilisk dance in victory. 
The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 
The screen goes white. 
Mushroom cloud animation with message. 
Oracle:[[ Congratulations the world has ended because of you | ]]
Player: [[ answer: Oh No! I didn't look |Continue]] |]][[ answer:Ok|end1]]

title: GotoEnd2
body:
Oracle appears again 
Oracle: Congratulations Chosen One, you have saved the World. 
Oracle: Here is your reward,take a screenshot now before it goes away.
Pick Reward button. 
Oracle: Goodbye Chosen One.

title: Dakhaas
body:
Builder: Oh don't make a fuss about it. 
Builder: It is just a term of endearment.
Builder: Here, take these blomme. Could you give them to that kindje, Truus? 
Builder: She seemed verdrietig earlier and I wanted to cheer her up. 
Builder:I heard they are her favorite. 
Pick up Daffodils button
<<if visited("Builder")is true>> [[ Go to Truus|GotoTruus|]]
Route to next location appears

title: Stolenwallet
body:
Tackle Villon
Villon: You don't have to be violent mon ami.
Villon: You looked very heavy and I just wanted to relieve you of the weight.
Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.
You look down and see the poem on the ground. It must have fallen when you tackled him.
Pick up poem button 
Oracle: Look at the back of the poem, it is addressed to the Carilloner
<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] |]]
Route to next location appears

title: Waitup
body:
Villon stops for a second.
Villon turns around.
Player: Aren't you forgetting something?
Villon: Me?
Villon: Oh you mean the wallet? 
Villon: I don't know how that got there. `
Villon: Pardonne-moi mon ami
Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.
Villon drops poem 
Pick up poem button 
Oracle: Look at the back of the poem, it is addressed to the Carilloner
<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] |]]
Route to next location appears

title: Helper
body:
Help Anna Maria pick up the books
Button give the quill 
Anna Maria: Oh thank you. 
Anna Maria: [[ You should not help me, the other students might bully you too if they see help me| ]]
Player:[[ answer: You pave the way for others after you. In the future, more people have equal access to education in the Netherlands notably thanks to you |]] |]]
Anna Maria: I am glad that in the future people do not have to take classes behind a curtain. 
Anna Maria: But it is not that bad, Professor Voetius has been very kind in helping me join the University.
Anna Maria leaves 
See book on the ground
Pick up book 
See Buys Ballot on the cover
<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]
Route to next location appears

title: Slacker
body:
Anna Maria picks up the books.
Give the quill button. 
Anna Maria leaves 
See book on the ground
Pick up book 
See Buys Ballot on the cover
<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]
Route to next location appears
